===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[stretch]]; to [[open up]]; to [[spread]]
#: {{zh-x|張開|to open up, to spread}}
#: {{zh-x|張口|to gape, to yawn}}
# to [[expand]]; to [[spread]]
#: {{zh-x|擴張|to expand, expansion}}
#: {{zh-x|聲張|to make public, to disclose}}
# [[nervous]]; [[tense]]
#: {{zh-x|緊張|nervous}}
#: {{zh-x|張力|tension}}
# {{zh-classifier|things with a [[flat]] [[surface]]|t=[[sheet]]}}
#: {{zh-x|一 張 地圖|a map}}
#: {{zh-x|一 張 桌子|a table}}
#: {{zh-x|幾 張 凳|several chairs|C}}
#: {{zh-x|兩 張 紙|two sheets of paper|C}}

# {{surname|lang=zh}} [[Zhang]], {{non-gloss definition|listed #24 of the ''{{w|Baijiaxing}}}}
